name: Ruby Class Projects
body:
# ruby_class_projects
These are my versions of exercises, programs and homework for the [ Complete Ruby On Rails Developer Course](https://www.udemy.com/the-complete-ruby-on-rails-developer-course/learn/#/) by Mashrur Hossain and Rob Percival.
This repo is updated as I complete courses. If you don't see what you need check back later.
I make repos for everything now. Repos are cool. 
Feel free to comment, follow and download anything you need.
Cheers!
~Red
![Ruby](https://cdn.tutsplus.com/net/uploads/legacy/417_ruby/images/ruby.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
